remaining_blockers: Update `rule_specs/*/00_base_rule.yml` to include `severity` and `remediation_hint` across product rule sets
Implement product evaluator adapters under `strategy_e/adapters/` mapping `evaluate(resource)` -> `run_pipeline_on_text`
Add minimal unit tests and CI validations for adapters and promoted schemas
Assign owners for promoted schema and rule registry updates
notes: Phase-5 readiness gate indicates activation is not allowed. All preconditions (schema, rules, evaluators, CI) must be satisfied and validated via CI before global_readiness can be set to true. Follow the activation plan steps in `ai_reports/phase5_activation_plan.json` and re-run readiness gate after each completed PR.
source_review: Derived from ai_reports/phase5_activation_precheck.json and ai_reports/phase5_activation_plan.json. No files outside `ai_reports/` were modified.
